ROOT.GetLineName: SELECT NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B WHERE ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B WHERE ID={0}
ROOT.GetFaultList:
SELECT * FROM ( select FAULT_ID,'ACLINE' AS DEV_TYPE,EQUIP_ID AS DEV_ID,d.NAME as DEV_NAME,FAULT_TIME,FT.NAME AS FT_TYPE,FAULT_DETAIL from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_H_FAULT F LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_FAULT FT ON F.FAULT_TYPE=FT.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_b d ON F.EQUIP_ID=d.id WHERE F.EQUIP_ID = {0} UNION ALL
select FAULT_ID,'ACLINE' AS DEV_TYPE,EQUIP_ID AS DEV_ID,d.NAME as DEV_NAME,FAULT_TIME,FT.NAME AS FT_TYPE,FAULT_DETAIL from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_H_FAULT F LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_FAULT FT ON F.FAULT_TYPE=FT.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_b d ON F.EQUIP_ID=d.id WHERE F.EQUIP_ID = {0} ) A ORDER BY FAULT_TIME DESC
ROOT.GetChaoliu: SELECT ISNULL(A.LINE_ID,B.LINE_ID) AS LINE_ID,A.V00 AS P,B.V00 AS Q FROM ( SELECT LINE_ID,V00 FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_LINE_REALTIME_MEA WHERE MEAS_TYPE='00002001' AND VOLTAGE_TYPE IN (1001,1002,1003,2000,2001,2002,2003,2004) AND V00 IS NOT NULL ) A FULL JOIN ( SELECT LINE_ID,V00 FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_LINE_REALTIME_MEA WHERE MEAS_TYPE='00002002' AND VOLTAGE_TYPE IN (1001,1002,1003,2000,2001,2002,2003,2004) AND V00 IS NOT NULL ) B ON A.LINE_ID=B.LINE_ID
ROOT.GetAllLineInfo: SELECT L.ID,L.NAME,NULL AS LONGITUDE_TOWER,NULL AS LATITUDE_TOWER,NULL AS LONGITUDE_STA,NULL AS LATITUDE_STA, L.DISPATCH_ORG_ID,L.GRID_ID,L.VOLTAGE_TYPE,L.START_ST_ID,L.END_ST_ID,L.OPERATE_DATE,L.RUNNING_STATE,L.LENGTH FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B L UNION ALL SELECT L.ID,L.NAME,NULL AS LONGITUDE_TOWER,NULL AS LATITUDE_TOWER,NULL AS LONGITUDE_STA,NULL AS LATITUDE_STA, L.DISPATCH_ORG_ID,L.GRID_ID,L.VOLTAGE_TYPE,L.START_ST_ID,L.END_ST_ID,L.OPERATE_DATE,L.RUNNING_STATE,L.LENGTH FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B L
ROOT.GetLineList: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.ID,A.NAME,E.NAME AS VOLNAME,A.LENGTH,C.IMAXLONG_20,D.ID AS GRIDID,D.NAME AS GRIDNAME,B.ID AS DCCID,B.NAME_ABBREVIATION AS DCCNAME,A.OPERATE_DATE,A.EXPIRY_DATE,A.RUNNING_STATE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B AS A LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B AS B ON A.DISPATCH_ORG_ID=B.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_P AS C ON A.ID=C.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B AS D ON A.GRID_ID=D.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE AS E ON A.VOLTAGE_TYPE=E.CODE WHERE A.VOLTAGE_TYPE IN ({0}) UNION ALL SELECT A.ID,A.NAME,E.NAME AS VOLNAME,A.LENGTH,C.IMAXLONG_20,D.ID AS GRIDID,D.NAME AS GRIDNAME,B.ID AS DCCID,B.NAME_ABBREVIATION AS DCCNAME,A.OPERATE_DATE,A.EXPIRY_DATE,A.RUNNING_STATE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B AS A LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B AS B ON A.DISPATCH_ORG_ID=B.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_P AS C ON A.ID=C.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B AS D ON A.GRID_ID=D.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE AS E ON A.VOLTAGE_TYPE=E.CODE WHERE A.VOLTAGE_TYPE IN ({0}) ) A ORDER BY A.LENGTH DESC

Meas.MaxTime: SELECT MAX(CREATE_TIME) FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_H1_MEA_{0} m join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINEEND_B l on m.ACLINEEND_ID = l.ID WHERE MEAS_TYPE='00002001' AND l.LINE_ID={1}
Meas.Data: SELECT V00,V01,V02,V03,V04,V05,V06,V07,V08,V09,V10,V11,V12,V13,V14,V15,V16,V17,V18,V19,V20,V21,V22,V23,V24,V25,V26,V27,V28,V29,V30,V31,V32,V33,V34,V35,V36,V37,V38,V39,V40,V41,V42,V43,V44,V45,V46,V47,V48,V49,V50,V51,V52,V53,V54,V55,V56,V57,V58,V59 FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_H1_MEA_{0} m join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINEEND_B l on m.ACLINEEND_ID = l.ID WHERE MEAS_TYPE='00002001' AND l.LINE_ID={1} AND CREATE_TIME={2}
